column4: Provide the ability for agencies to submit investment requests to Treasury online.
Ability to establish Automated Investment request trigger.
Route agency investment requests to Treasury through automated workflow.
Perform real time cash availability edit to ensure that cash is available to invest.
Ability to forecast Cash Requirements (Available cash plus in transit items, less outstanding payables, plus or minus transfers).
Treasury approves investment and provides funds to BTI or IMB to invest.
Record investment in GL - in multiple investment pools.
